items.content_html: A Next.js project demonstrating state management using Nuqs, a lightweight and efficient state management library. This repository showcases best practices for managing global and local state in a Next.js application with Nuqs, focusing on performance, reactivity, and developer experience.
items.title: iamVihanga/NUQS-State-Management-NextJS: A Next.js project demonstrating state management using Nuqs, a lightweight and efficient state management library. This repository showcases best practices for managing global and local state in a Next.js application with Nuqs, focusing on performance, reactivity, and developer experience.
